articles.author: Liam James
articles.title: National Grid boss warns of blackouts during ‘deepest, darkest’ winter evenings - The Independent
articles.description: Power could go out between 4pm and 7pm on some evenings if Europe faces further cuts from Russia
articles.content:
The head of the National Grid has warned British households that blackouts may be imposed between 4pm and 7pm on really, really cold winter weekdays if Europe cuts gas exports.
John Pettigrew said e… [+2174 chars]

articles.author: Linda Schmidt
articles.title: U.S. officials concerned about new COVID subvariants - FOX 5 New York
articles.description: COVID-19 infections from the omicron subvariants designated BQ.1 and BQ.1.1 are growing fast in Europe and appear to be rising in the U.S., too.
articles.content:
NEW YORK - COVID-19 infections from the omicron subvariants designated BQ.1 and BQ.1.1 are growing fast in Europe.
